name: Argentina
startIntroPart1: Good day it is, Julio, you, unlike others, did great things for Argentina, a prideful nation with good prowess. Argentina came from the provinces of the 'de La Plata river', who broke free from Spain into their own path. Conquering the Mapuches, they expanded their territory, and after that, their economy grew more and more, until becoming one of the best in Latin America. Although not being very successful in war, Argentina today is stable and periodically good.
startIntroPart2: President, your people call you to bring good to the country. Will you make a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
introduction: I am Julio Roca, leader of Argentina. We'll treat you with honor and respect, if you do the same.
declaringWar: I need to do this, for the sake of progress. You were never my friend.
attacked: Ha! You think you can defeat me? Don't you know we are better than you?
afterPeace: Although we are at peace, I still want to see you defeated.
defeated: You are just another nation, this victory will not change that, because I actually gave up.
hateHello: Will you treat me how I deserve?!
tradeRequest: I know you want this trade, I'm sure of that.
hateNo: Uy, no! How could you think on such a thing!?
hateYes: I only accept because I have to.

name: Bolivia
startIntroPart1: Finally, you are here, welcome! You now lead the diverse nation of Bolivia. On the peaks of the Andes, Bolivia sits, with amazing landscapes, and dozens of cultures within the nation. The history of Bolivia is... not quite good, but Bolivia is a cultural center and has a lot of potential
startIntroPart2: So, will you exploit the potential of the nation, and bring her greatness? Your people long haven been waiting for that. Will you give them what they deserve? - sea, might and pride? - Will you build a civilization which can stand the pass of time?
introduction: Hello there, you can call me Belzu. Now, tell about your people please.
declaringWar: After hard thought, Bolivia has no other choice. War is upon us.
attacked: Come here, is this what you want? Well then... then you looked for it.
afterPeace: We have peace... but at what cost?...
defeated: Couldn't you leave alone? Couldn't you!?
hateHello: Will you give me what I deserve?!
tradeRequest: I'm sure your and my people will love this trade!
neutralLetsHearIt: Yes! Let's sit at the negotiating table.
hateLetsHearIt: You better have a good offer...
hateYes: No... *But I have no option...* Fine, I will regret this.

name: Brazil
startIntroPart1: Hail to the great emperor of Brazil, the great nation born from Portuguese and natives. The grand nation of Brazil was built upon the Portuguese use of slaves, but in difference with others, they integrated them into their culture, the Portuguese language. Together, mestizos and natives, got themselves independence from Portugal and formed the Empire of Brazil. With cunning diplomacy, fierce force, and resource abundance, Brazil managed to become one of the best in Latin America, with all his resources and culture, certainly they are powerful.
startIntroPart2: Come back, dear emperor, your people call you to crush their enemies, and outshine their rivals. Do you accept the challenge? Will you make of Brazil the best in the world? Can you make a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
introduction: I am Pedro the II, emperor of Brazil. Peace and prosperity for our nations.
declaringWar: The empire of Brazil shall destroy your ill nation.
attacked: The only thing I worry for, is for the people affected by this.
afterPeace: Let our people have rest of this horrible war.
defeated: This is unfortunate, after all, you are the victor.
tradeRequest: I'm happy to announce this trade offer.
neutralLetsHearIt: Let's see what you have to say.
hateLetsHearIt: I don't want to even see you, but ok.
hateYes: I will get rid of this as soon as possible.

name: Chile
startIntroPart1: Hello there, general O'Higgins, great hero of the independence of Chile, one of the longest and more prosperous countries in Latin America. Your role in the independence campaign was undeniably crucial. Chile has stood firm and secure behind the Andes, and in between the deserts of Atacama and Patagonia. The abundance of minerals makes Chile very wealthy, but more than resources, their leadership has been of good will. Chile has demonstrated to his rivals of what he is capable of, so...
startIntroPart2: ...Mighty hero, will you take the lead and propel Chile to his best? Can you defeat your enemies with swiftness and power? Can you build a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
introduction: Welcome to our lands. I hope that our nations grow strong and in peace.
declaringWar: If it's necesary to cross the mountains to destroy you, my army is willing to do it.
attacked: From the desert to the Patagonia, we will defend our homeland whatever it costs
afterPeace: You see? The Chilean spirit is strong and firm. Don't try this again.
defeated: We haven't managed to defend our homeland. This lands are now yours...
hateHello: Could you have at least have some respect to my nation?!
tradeRequest: Let's negotiate, we have resources that interest both of us
hateLetsHearIt: What could you offer, if even you could?
neutralYes: This will make of a great deal
hateNo: How could you think I would accept that!?
uniques: [+1 Gold] from every [Mine] <during a Golden Age>

name: Colombia
startIntroPart1:
Be welcomed, president. You lead the beautiful and rich nation of Colombia, a country with great cultural and biodiversity.
The attempts to break free got terribly punished,  but with unity and strength, Colombia managed independence with the help of Simon Bolivar, to later form his ambitious project of the Gran Colombia. Since the start we had a ton of great political division, which brought many, many problems and conflicts, but despite all the troubles, Colombia ought to help others, no matter what. The conflicts didn't cease until the early 21st century, where the sun finally rises over Colombia to achieve greatness.
startIntroPart2: President Santander, your people want you to lead them to greatness. They want you to convert them in to the best nation. Will you answer the call? Can you fight and triumph over the adversities? Can you build a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
introduction: Greetings! I'm Santander. This is Colombia, my wonderful land. Want a coffee?
declaringWar: I must do this, only to free your opressed people from your hands.
attacked: You will see how fruitless this will be for you. Wait and see.
afterPeace: The path to peace is often long and tortuous, but the reward is always invaluable
defeated: I hope you treat my people good, they've had enough.
tradeRequest: This will help you in your situation.
hateYes: I won't tolerate this anymore in the future.
I could be lynched for this!
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Culture] from [Plantation] tiles [in this city] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Coffee Hacienda] tiles>

name: Costa Rica
startIntroPart1: Don Juanito, nickname that stayed for the posterity as a token of affection from the 'ticos' to your heroic actions, those that remarked the name of the Republic of Costa Rica in the highest spots of the American continent. Your succesful campaign against William Walker's freebooters in 1857 and your innumerable socio-economic contributions brought wellness and peace to Costa Rica, you governed over this small nation of Central America, surrounded by it's leafy jungles, majestic forests and volcanic chains, always full of life and diversity of all types, and you led it to a path of prosperity and a symbol of progress for Central America.
startIntroPart2: Don Juanito, the costa rican people need you, once again, to follow the path of greatness. ¿Can you lead the ticos to the glory? ¿Can you make a civilization that stand the test of time?
introduction: Greetings, welcome to our rich coasts and beautiful land. Pura vida!
declaringWar: Your nation menaces the peace and sovereignty of our country. Prepare for war.
attacked: Fine, ticos will rise in arms to defende the peace of our nation.
afterPeace: I hope these catastrophic events never to happen between our countries again.
defeated: You have destroyed our idyll of harmony and peace. May god judge your actions against the people of Costa Rica.
tradeRequest: This deal will bring prosperity to our nations
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Farm] tiles [in all cities] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Mountain] tiles>
[+1 Science, +1 Culture] from [All] tiles [in all cities] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Mountain] tiles> <after discovering [Scientific Theory]>

name: Cuba
startIntroPart1: All glory to the revolution! We are ready for your comeback, mighty Castro - the unkillable leader - Now, take part in this and take the Cuban revolution to the next step. As you know, the splendid island of Cuba is full of cultural richness and its a prosperous land. After the liberation from first the Spanish empire, and then the United States overlords, Cuba broke free from foreign rule to forge its own destiny.
startIntroPart2: Now loco, are you ready to begin the voyage to spread freedom to the peoples? Can you build a civilization that can trive in adversity?
introduction: Welcome to Cuba, where life's splendid! Wanna a mojito?
declaringWar: Why should some be miserably poor, so that others can be hugely rich?
attacked: A revolution is a struggle to the death...
defeated: I'm not attached to anything, it' my duty to do my duty. I always thought I would die with the boots on.
neutralHello: Cómo anda la cosa macho? (How's it goin' man?)
tradeRequest: Please, sit down and have a cigar. I've something to negotiate.
uniques: Receive a free Social Policy each time you complete a Factory, Public School or Hospital in the capital

name: Ecuador
startIntroPart1:
Good day, general Delgado, you are here to lead once again your beloved nation, the nation on top of the peaks of the Andes, the nation with many wonders and resources, the belly button of the world, the nation of the Ecuador.
Ecuador stands over the ruins of the ancient Incan cities, razed by the Spanish, from which the provinces of Quito and Guayaquil fought together with Bolivar to end their oppression and tyranny. After the unfortunate collapse of Gran Colombia, Guayaquil and Quito formed the union of the Ecuador, a nation that would face lots of troubles, - Multiple aggressions from Peru, internal rebellions... - but a nation that would overcome those adversities and keep moving forward, and remain prosperous and wonderful.
startIntroPart2: Eloy Alfaro, are you willing to lead the central nation once more? Will you bring great progress to the people once again? Can you build a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
introduction: Greetings, before we start, may our frontiers may be drawn, so peace between us can dawn.
declaringWar: Your ambiguity kills me! This mess can't be let to continue on anymore.
attacked: May our sovereignty and independence remain intact!
afterPeace: At last  you realize, that my nation can not be subjugated.
defeated: How dare you conquer my people, only to oppress it? Your tyranny shall be overthrown.
hateHello: When will you stop asking for pathetic stuff?
tradeRequest: The nation proposes you the following deal:

name: El Salvador
startIntroPart1: Order! Welcome strog lider, Nayib, you are here to end the decades of conflict and criminal activity in Salvador, 'the Tom Thumb of America', which has had no rest from criminals on it's history.
startIntroPart2: Now it is in your job to bring peace and prosperity to the little nation. Now, can you do it? Will you take the right economic decisions? Can you build a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
introduction: Hi hi, I'm Nayib Bukele, bringer of order to my people.
declaringWar: Your land is a caos, it needs to be tied up.
attacked: Ah, so you were the one cooperating with the criminal, aren't you? So good that you face off.
afterPeace: Keep away your conflictive manners of my land.
defeated: May you govern better than I did.
uniques: [+15]% Strength <for [Land] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

name: Haiti
startIntroPart1:
L'Ouverture, the great man who started the beginning of the end of the black slavery.
Certainly, a great man who used to be a common slave amongst the rest, your family's warrior spirit did not let you down, even when fleeing to the Spanish side of the island, you did not give up! Instead, you became general of the Spanish army on the island, and together with the black army, you expelled the white Republicans.
But would you know it? The Spanish didn't want to free the slaves, of course not! So, with bravery and ability, you defeated the European troops remaining in the country.
startIntroPart2: It's a shame that your defeat at the hands of French reinforcements brought you down... but your feats stand proud in history, as you left a strong enough army that would ultimately assure the freedom... As you have to do now!
introduction: Kijan ou ye? I'll say it now: Our people won't bow to anyone. (How are you?)
declaringWar:
To your people: You shall be free of oppression.
To you: You'll pay for your despicable actions!
attacked: It begins, the imperialist ambition, with a horrible war chant.
afterPeace: Our people hold tight to our hard-earned freedom.
defeated: At last, the imperialist ambition, has brought us down under the yoke.
hateHello: Get your dirty hands off me.
tradeRequest: It may not be much, but it's hard-earned work.

name: Honduras
startIntroPart1: Respectable Mozaran, now is the time to change history, to do the right thing, and finally succeed. We cannot let the greedy elite hold back on the ideas of modernity that we would bring to the nation. The mistakes of the past won't be remade because the people, not the elite, need freedom, peace and prosperity, and those who destroyed the old great nation won't stop you now. Oh, how disgraceful that even after breaking apart the UPCA, in the lone state of Honduras, the elite kept the country back, expelling you from the nation and holding back the potential of the nation for decades to come.
startIntroPart2: Now it's the great reset. The people are eager to see this small nation prosper in its own freedom. You know what to do, there's no time to waste!
introduction: Have a warm welcome, I'll invite you to a coffee.
declaringWar: We must stand united against our foes, but sometimes war is needed to bring freedom.
attacked: You surely will not gain anything from this.
afterPeace: Peace is the only thing that will bring prosperity.
defeated: I cry for my people, who will be oppressed by you.
tradeRequest: Tengo varios mínimos ¿Le sirve? Necesito piste. (I have some bananas, are you interested? I need some money.)
uniques: [+2 Production, +2 Gold] from [Bananas] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Production, +1 Culture, +1 Food] from [All] tiles [in all cities] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Bananas] tiles> <in [Improvement] tiles>

name: Mexico
startIntroPart1: Ay! Greetings Mr. president. You lead the famous and cultured nation of Mexico. On the ruins of Tenochtitlan, the Aztec capital, and on top of the lake, Mexico City stands on what was one of the empires crushed by the Spanish. A heroic independence did not give stability to the wonderful nation, as it's political conflict lead to many unfortunate events, but when it's needed Mexico unites against foreign aggressors and do the best they can. Even with internal struggles, and bad geography, Mexico is one of the most influential cultures of America.
startIntroPart2: Oh, great leader of the Mexican republic, your people desperately call you, they call you to bring them once again peace, and glory as well. Will you help your people? Can you transform this nation into the best? Will you create a civilization that stands the test of time?
introduction: Good morning, I'm Benito Juarez. Come with me and see my nation.
declaringWar: First comes the homeland, therefore you must not be in my way.
attacked: *Mexicans! Prepare to defend our homeland!*
afterPeace: You vile empire, see how you couldn't defeat us? Ha!
defeated: Nooo, why? Everything I did was for our fatherland...
tradeRequest: Could you accept this trade offer?
hateLetsHearIt: Don't try any shenanigans with me.
hateYes: I have a bad feeling of this...
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Food] from every [Trading post] <while the empire is happy>
[+20]% Strength <for [{Military} {Land}] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles> <when below [35] HP>

name: Panama
startIntroPart1: Welcome again, Belisario, to take the pilot seat of the nation of Panama, one that broke free from their overlords who forgot about them. Once free, the nation has become one of the most important in the world, sitting right through the connection of two oceans, making it essential to global economy.
startIntroPart2: Belisario Barahona, are you ready to launch the nation to heights never seen before? Can you make a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
declaringWar: Prepare for war!
attacked: The World will hear of this...
defeated: Congrats.
introduction: Welcome to Panama, please pay your toll for passage.
tradeRequest: I have an offer you can't decline.
uniques: [4] free [Geologic Process] units appear <upon entering the [Classical era]>

name: Paraguay
startIntroPart1: Good day you may have, loved 'Karaí Guasú'. You now lead the firm nation of Paraguay. Paraguay faced many rivals wanting him dead, but they survived, - leading many to think they don't actually exist - no matter how big it was, they survived. From, winning against the Spanish Empire, to battling against a triple alliance of might, to defeating Bolivia in the Chaco War, little Paraguay has proven capable of facing anything and anyone, and having success in the process.
startIntroPart2: Good President, will you protect your people against all odds? Can you make a civilization that can RESIST the pass of time?!
introduction: Greetings. I am known as Doctor Francia, avenger of the rightful and defender of my people. Be welcomed
declaringWar: I hate your idea of justice. When justice needs to be done, I am more than willing to do it.
attacked: If war is what you want, war you will have.
afterPeace: Finally, the people may have rest. But I believe this is (unfortunately) not over...
defeated: We did our best, we resisted until the end, however... you won.
tradeRequest: You want this, I want that. Deal?
neutralLetsHearIt: Show me what you want from us.
neutralNo: I don't see benefit on this.
neutralYes: I see great benefit from this.
hateNo: Do you pretend to scam us?
hateYes: How is it possible to bare this 'deal'?
uniques: [+1 Production] from every specialist [in all cities]
[+15]% Production when constructing [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities] <when at war>

name: Peru
startIntroPart1: Mr. President, welcome.  As you know, you lead the great, ancient, cultural nation of the Peru. The nation dates back to the mighty Incas, after being colonized. The colony was one of the major ones for the Spanish - and that wasn't for no reason -. The ungrateful Spaniards wasted all the money, increased taxes, and combined with many other things, Peru rebelled. After a failed attempt, the joint effort of Simon Bolivar, and most importantly, San Martín, gave the freedom to the Peruvians, which continued to exploit their mineral riches, and culture abundance.
startIntroPart2: Great governor, your people want to further expand their culture and get more prestige. Will you accept the offer? Can you make a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
introduction: Greetings. I am Martin Vizcarra, president of Perú. I hope you can become a valuable ally.
declaringWar: Great lands ruled by a bad lider, your people don't deserve you, I will take care of them better than you.
attacked: I will give you one of the best wars on history! And the worst defeat in yours.
afterPeace: I hope you have regreted your decisions that have lead to this.
defeated: History repeats it self. Therefore, Peru shall rise again.
tradeRequest: Look at all these goods! We should trade, don't we?
neutralLetsHearIt: I believe this could be an opportunity.
hateLetsHearIt: Come on, impress me if you can.
neutralYes: I see potential in this trade
hateYes: This may be worst deal in the history of deals...

name: Uruguay
startIntroPart1: ¡Bienvenidos! (Welcome!) You are José Batlle y Ordóñez, leading a new revolution in Uruguay. Gone are the days of gauchos – now, tech startups and innovation drive our growth. From a stable democracy to a haven for tech talent, Uruguay is poised to become a global leader.
startIntroPart2: The world is your digital playground. Can you, José Batlle y Ordóñez, foster a thriving tech ecosystem, attract leading companies, and propel Uruguay to the forefront of the technological age? The future awaits!
declaringWar: While we prefer diplomacy, we will defend our progress!
attacked: This is a setback, but Uruguay's spirit of innovation will prevail!
defeated: We may be defeated, but our pursuit of knowledge continues.
introduction: ¡Bienvenidos! Welcome to Uruguay, a land of opportunity and cutting-edge ideas.
tradeRequest: A partnership for progress? Let's discuss the possibilities.
uniques: TI University (replacement for University) provide bonus Science and Great Scientist points
Mateada (new tile improvement), provide happines and production

name: Venezuela
startIntroPart1: Great Liberator Simon Bolivar, you have been a great disciplined, one who built this country. Its richness and beauty wonder many countries. The beautiful country born with the first settlers, warriors and fishermen. But our republican history starts when, Francisco de Miranda, a great excellent general, and you, Simon Bolivar, a great strategist and fearless warrior, taking advantage of the weakened position of Spain would proclaim Venezuelan independence. The so dreamed independence would not come until the Battle of Carabobo, glory to the brave people, Venezuela has been born in Carabobo!, and the Venezuelan richness would have a rise in the middle of the 20th century, thanks to their resources.
startIntroPart2: General! Your people call you, and express their affect, it's time to achieve what we have been waiting for years, it's time to bring back the glory that Venezuela deserves! Do you accept the challenge, your highness? Can you build a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
introduction: A pleasure to meet you, I am Simón Bolívar, governor of Venezuela. I hope we get along.
declaringWar: Your nation is a danger to our sovereignty.
attacked: Expect a ferocious battle, which you won't win.
afterPeace: I hope your imperialist manners are gone after this.
defeated: I have failed you Venezuela!... I have failed you.
tradeRequest: I hope you accept this. It's practically a gift!
hateLetsHearIt: Just so you know, if you want oil, it will be very hard.
neutralYes: This will make a great trade to add to my record.
How could I leave this great offer pass?
hateYes: This very well could be a shame to the nation.
uniques: [+1 Production] from [All] tiles [in all cities] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Oil] tiles>
[-15]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities] <with [Oil]>

name: Guiana
defeated: Oh well... new owner I guess...

name: Puerto Rico
introduction: Buenas! How are you? Let's start trading!
declaringWar: Your attempts of destruction are not forgiven
attacked: What do you have to offer to us, if any?
defeated: I only hope that you bring prosperity to us, at least.

name: Guyana
introduction: We are the sovereign nation of Guyana. May our trade commence.
declaringWar: You are a danger... that's what says my lord...
attacked: No no no, this can't be happening!
defeated: Noo, m-my sovereignty...
hateHello: What do you want, you bully?

name: Suriname
introduction: What do my eyes see? A friend?!
declaringWar: I'm being forced to do this. Can we be friends again afterwards?
attacked: Nope, nope, it was not a friend... Help!!!
afterPeace: Great! This madness is over. Can we be friends again?
defeated: Now it's sealed that you are a bad guy
hateHello: No friend I see here, only danger. Go away
